stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why many Europeans maintained a belief in the benefits of scientific progress throughout the twentieth century?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of contextualizing twentieth-century global conflict.

choicesHtml: New advances in science challenged previously held certainties about the universe.
New communications technology allowed for greater imports of foreign culture.
New technological developments made significant material improvements in the lives of most Europeans.
New technologies deployed in warfare reinforced Social Darwinist beliefs regarding European superiority.
